00023 BusIfInterfaceModeTab::BusIfInterfaceModeTab(LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00024         BusIfGeneralTab* generalTab,
00025         QSharedPointer<Component> component,
00026         void* dataPointer, 
00027         QWidget *parent): 
00028 QWidget(parent), busif_(static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer)),
00029 modeSelector_(this),
00030 stack_(this) {
00031 
00032         Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "BusIfInterfaceModeTab constructor",
00033                 "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00034 
00035         // set up the selector box
00036         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("master"));
00037         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("slave"));
00038         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("system"));
00039         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("mirrored slave"));
00040         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("mirrored master"));
00041         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("mirrored system"));
00042         modeSelector_.addItem(tr("monitor"));
00043         connect(&modeSelector_, SIGNAL(currentIndexChanged(int)),
00044                 this, SLOT(onIndexChanged(int)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00045 
00046         modeSelector_.setProperty("mandatoryField", true);
00047 
00048         // set up the different editors for different interface modes.
00049         setupEditors(generalTab, libHandler, component);
00050 
00051         QFormLayout* selectorLayout = new QFormLayout();
00052         selectorLayout->addRow(tr("Select interface mode"), &modeSelector_);
00053 
00054         QVBoxLayout* topLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this);
00055         topLayout->addLayout(selectorLayout);
00056         topLayout->addWidget(&stack_);
00057 }

00062 bool BusIfInterfaceModeTab::isValid() const {
00063         // get pointer to the editor
00064         QWidget* widget = stack_.currentWidget();
00065         BusIfInterfaceModeEditor* editor = static_cast<BusIfInterfaceModeEditor*>(
00066                 widget);
00067 
00068         return editor->isValid();
00069 }

00071 void BusIfInterfaceModeTab::restoreChanges() {
00072 
00073         // select the correct editor that matches the interface mode
00074         switch (busif_->getInterfaceMode()) {
00075                 case General::MASTER: {
00076                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(0);
00077                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(0);
00078                         break;
00079                                                           }
00080                 case General::SLAVE: {
00081                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(1);
00082                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(1);
00083                         break;
00084                                                          }
00085                 case General::SYSTEM: {
00086                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(2);
00087                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(2);
00088                         break;
00089                                                           }
00090                 case General::MIRROREDSLAVE: {
00091                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(3);
00092                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(3);
00093                         break;
00094                                                                          }
00095                 case General::MIRROREDMASTER: {
00096                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(4);
00097                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(4);
00098                         break;
00099                                                                           }
00100                 case General::MIRROREDSYSTEM: {
00101                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(5);
00102                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(5);
00103                         break;
00104                                                                           }
00105                 case General::MONITOR: {
00106                         stack_.setCurrentIndex(6);
00107                         modeSelector_.setCurrentIndex(6);
00108                         break;
00109                                                            }
00110                 default:
00111                         return;
00112         }
00113 
00114         // get pointer to the editor
00115         QWidget* widget = stack_.currentWidget();
00116         BusIfInterfaceModeEditor* editor = static_cast<BusIfInterfaceModeEditor*>(
00117                 widget);
00118         // and restore changes
00119         editor->restoreChanges();
00120 }
00121 
00122 void BusIfInterfaceModeTab::applyChanges() {
00123 
00124         // get pointer to the editor
00125         QWidget* widget = stack_.currentWidget();
00126         BusIfInterfaceModeEditor* editor = static_cast<BusIfInterfaceModeEditor*>(
00127                 widget);
00128 
00129         // if editor is valid then apply changes
00130         if (editor->isValid())
00131                 editor->applyChanges();
00132 }

00134 void BusIfInterfaceModeTab::onIndexChanged( int index ) {
00135         // change the widget to match the selected
00136         stack_.setCurrentIndex(index);
00137 
00138         // get pointer to the editor
00139         QWidget* widget = stack_.currentWidget();
00140         BusIfInterfaceModeEditor* editor = static_cast<BusIfInterfaceModeEditor*>(
00141                 widget);
00142         // and update the editor 
00143         editor->updateDisplay();
00144 
00145         emit contentChanged();
00146 }

00148 void BusIfInterfaceModeTab::setupEditors(BusIfGeneralTab* generalTab,
00149                                                                                  LibraryInterface* libHandler,
00150                                                                                  QSharedPointer<Component> component) {
00151         BusIfInterfaceMaster* master = new BusIfInterfaceMaster(General::MASTER, 
00152                 busif_, component, &stack_);
00153         connect(master, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00154                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00155         connect(master, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00156                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00157         connect(master, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00158                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00159 
00160         BusIfInterfaceSlave* slave = new BusIfInterfaceSlave(busif_,&stack_);
00161         connect(slave, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00162                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00163         connect(slave, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00164                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00165         connect(slave, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00166                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00167 
00168         BusIfInterfaceSystem* system = new BusIfInterfaceSystem(General::SYSTEM,
00169                 generalTab, libHandler, busif_, &stack_);
00170         connect(system, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00171                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00172         connect(system, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00173                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00174         connect(system, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00175                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00176 
00177         BusIfInterfaceMSlave* mirSlave = new BusIfInterfaceMSlave(busif_, &stack_);
00178         connect(mirSlave, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00179                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00180         connect(mirSlave, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00181                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00182         connect(mirSlave, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00183                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00184 
00185         BusIfInterfaceMaster* mirMaster = new BusIfInterfaceMaster(General::MIRROREDMASTER, 
00186                 busif_, component, &stack_);
00187         connect(mirMaster, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00188                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00189         connect(mirMaster, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00190                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00191         connect(mirMaster, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00192                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00193 
00194         BusIfInterfaceSystem* mirSystem = new BusIfInterfaceSystem(
00195                 General::MIRROREDSYSTEM, generalTab, libHandler, busif_, &stack_);
00196         connect(mirSystem, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00197                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00198         connect(mirSystem, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00199                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00200         connect(mirSystem, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00201                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00202 
00203         BusIfInterfaceMonitor* monitor = new BusIfInterfaceMonitor(busif_, 
00204                 generalTab, libHandler, &stack_);
00205         connect(monitor, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00206                 this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00207         connect(monitor, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)),
00208                 this, SIGNAL(errorMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00209         connect(monitor, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)),
00210                 this, SIGNAL(noticeMessage(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00211 
00212         stack_.addWidget(master);
00213         stack_.addWidget(slave);
00214         stack_.addWidget(system);
00215         stack_.addWidget(mirSlave);
00216         stack_.addWidget(mirMaster);
00217         stack_.addWidget(mirSystem);
00218         stack_.addWidget(monitor);
00219 }

00221 General::InterfaceMode BusIfInterfaceModeTab::getInterfaceMode() {
00222         QWidget* widget = stack_.currentWidget();
00223         BusIfInterfaceModeEditor* editor = static_cast<BusIfInterfaceModeEditor*>(widget);
00224
